document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Witchcraft </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">has </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#809448">pedigree </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'Tis </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffc04e">early </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">our </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">Breath </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c54ff">mourners </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#809448">meet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">going </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">out </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">moment </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">our </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4ffd4">death </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Witchcraft has not a pedigree
